name: Asterix & Obelix XXL: Collection
summary:
Asterix & Obelix XXL Collection includes 3 Asterix & Obelix games!
Asterix & Obelix XXL: Romastered: Help Asterix and Obelix to rescue all the villagers kidnapped by Caesar and his army! Enjoy brand-new graphics and an improved gameplay in this remastered version. Discover 4 new game modes, including the retro mode where you can switch anytime to the original graphics.
Asterix & Obelix XXL 2: The druid Getafix betrayed the village and colluded with the Romans! Discover the truth behind this mysterious treason, and don't forget to slap some Romans on the way.
Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir: Discover the latest adventure of Asterix and Obelix and the incredible powers of the Crystal Menhir! This time experience a two-player co-op mode to play with your family or your friends!
